facts.text: Atlanta United FC joined the MLS in 2017 with Ronny Deila as their head coach.
Charlotte FC's inaugural season in the MLS was in 2022, and they are coached by Dean Smith.
Chicago Fire FC has been a part of the MLS since 1998, with Gregg Berhalter currently serving as their head coach.
FC Cincinnati was introduced to the MLS in 2019, with Pat Noonan as the head coach.
Columbus Crew, one of the original MLS teams, joined the league in 1996 and is currently coached by Wilfried Nancy.
D.C. United, another original MLS team from 1996, is now coached by Troy Lesesne.
Inter Miami CF's first MLS season was in 2020, with Javier Mascherano as their head coach.
CF Montréal joined the MLS in 2012 and is currently under the interim coaching of Marco Donadel.
Nashville SC's debut MLS season was in 2020, with B.J. Callaghan as the head coach.
New England Revolution has been in the MLS since its inaugural season in 1996, with Caleb Porter as the current head coach.
New York City FC joined the MLS in 2015 and is coached by Pascal Jansen.
The LA Galaxy have won the most MLS Cups with a total of 6 titles in the years 2002, 2005, 2011, 2012, 2014, and 2024.
D.C. United has won 4 MLS Cups in the years 1996, 1997, 1999, and 2004.
Columbus Crew has won 3 MLS Cups, with their victories coming in the years 2008, 2020, and 2023.
Los Angeles FC won their first MLS Cup in 2022.
Toronto FC's single MLS Cup win came in 2017.
The Tampa Bay Mutiny was an MLS team from 1996 until their final season in 2001.
Chivas USA was part of the MLS from 2005 until their last season in 2014.
New York City FC won their first MLS Cup in 2021.
The New York Red Bulls have won the Supporters' Shield three times: in 2013, 2015, and 2018.
Tampa Bay Mutiny won the Supporters' Shield in 1996.
Miami Fusion won the Supporters' Shield in 2001.
FC Dallas won the Supporters' Shield in 2016.
Philadelphia Union won the Supporters' Shield in 2020.
New England Revolution won the Supporters' Shield in 2021.
FC Cincinnati won the Supporters' Shield in 2023.
The estimated value of an MLS team in 2023 is $678 million.
Columbus Crew's sponsorship deal with Nationwide, DHL, and Ohio Health is valued at $3 million annually.
LA Galaxy's sponsorship deal with Herbalife is valued at $4.4 million annually.
CF Montréal's sponsorship deal with Bank of Montreal and Telus is valued at US$4 million annually.
Philadelphia Union's sponsorship deal with Bimbo Bakeries USA and Independence Blue Cross is valued at $3 million annually.
Toronto FC's sponsorship deal with Bank of Montreal and LG is valued at C$4 million+ annually.
Chris Wondolowski is the all-time leading goal scorer in MLS with 171 goals from 2005 to 2021.
Kei Kamara is the second all-time leading goal scorer in MLS with 146 goals.
Ante Razov is ranked 8th for assists in the MLS with a total of 114 assists.
Landon Donovan holds the record for the most assists in the MLS with 136 assists.
Nick Rimando is the all-time leader in shutouts in the MLS with 154 shutouts.
Nick Rimando also holds the record for the most games played in the MLS with 514 games.
Kei Kamara is the leading goal scorer among the listed players with 146 goals.
Nicolás Lodeiro leads in assists among the listed players with 78 assists.
Stefan Frei has the most shutouts among the listed players with 102 shutouts.
Kei Kamara has played the most games among the listed players with 432 games.
The MLS has been the Division 1 soccer league in the United States since 1996, succeeding the NASL.
